item.title: Identifying Equivalent Training Dynamics
item.description: New framework uses Koopman operator theory to identify equivalent training dynamics in deep neural networks, enabling quantitative comparison of different architectures and optimization methods.

item.title: State Chrono Representation for Enhancing Generalization in Reinforcement Learning
item.description: State Chrono Representation (SCR) enhances reinforcement learning generalization by incorporating extensive temporal information and cumulative rewards into state representations, improving performanc…

item.title: Who Evaluates the Evaluations? Objectively Scoring Text-to-Image Prompt Coherence Metrics with T2IScoreScore (TS2)
item.description: T2IScoreScore objectively evaluates text-to-image prompt faithfulness metrics using semantic error graphs, revealing that simpler metrics surprisingly outperform complex, computationally expensive one…
